display_long_description:
**The greatest strategy game of all time is now available in Mixed Reality!**

Choose from 4 breathtaking environments to play in VR or bring the game into your own space with MR. 

Challenge your friends, face off against our AI, or compete against other Chess enthusiasts worldwide.

Play using hand-tracking or controllers, and show off your best moves as you build up your ELO!

With Chess Club and the magic of Mixed Reality, you can enjoy the game in any real-world setting and invite your friends to join the fun!

[media]
 
# Key features
♘ Play against a friend or the AI

✌️ Hand-tracking and controllers support. Choose the way you play!

🏆 Casual and ranked matches

⛰️ 4 Environments: Grand Palace, Stonehenge, Escher Dream and Masters Garden

♟️  Choose your style: from old school chessboard to fantasy style, animated pieces 

🙂 Avatars and Voice IP to play with your friends

⚔️ Rematch System

📜 Track your moves history

⏲️ Select your favorite time rules

[media]
 

Join our Discord community to participate in tournaments and connect with more players (https://discord.gg/KrHZxYjXNR)
